text: Tiberiu Csik (born 12 December 1971) is a Romanian former professional footballer who played as a defender. After retirement Csik was associated for many years with his hometown team, Olimpia Satu Mare, in various positions ( main coach, youth coach, etc.), until the club was forced into dissolution in 2018https://www.digisport.ro/fotbal/liga-2/olimpia-satu-mare-s-a-retras-din- liga-a-ii-a-si-a-postat-cum-a-fost-praduit-clubul-393771 digisport.ro . After leaving Olimpia, Csik had a brief stint with Csenger FC in Hungary followed by Vointa Lazuri back in Romania.Ei sunt jucătorii care au îmbrăcat de cele mai multe ori tricoul Olimpiei. informatia-zilei.ro He is the older brother of former footballer Levente Csik. ==Honours== ;Steaua București *Liga I (6): 1992–93, 1993–94, 1994–95, 1995–96, 1996–97, 1997–98 *Cupa României (3): 1995–96, 1996–97, 1998–99 *Supercupa României (3): 1994, 1995, 1998 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Satu Mare Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:FC Olimpia Satu Mare players Category:FC Politehnica Timișoara players Category:FC Steaua București players Category:CSM Jiul Petroșani players Category:Újpest FC players Category:AFC Rocar București players Category:Kaposvári Rákóczi FC players Category:FC Universitatea Cluj players Category:CS Minerul Lupeni players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Hungary Category:Expatriate footballers in Hungary Category:Romanian football managers Category:FC Olimpia Satu Mare managers
title: Tiberiu Csik
